module: Module-level comment: The AudioPLL module generates an audio clock signal from a reference clock input, essential for digital audio processing. Utilizing a PLL component `AudioPLL_audio_pll_0`, it directly maps input signals (`ref_clk_clk`, `ref_reset_reset`) to the PLL and routes the PLL's outputs (`audio_clk_clk`, `reset_source_reset`) to its own outputs, ensuring straightforward signal transfer and minimal internal complexity.
